Akinima bụ obodo dị na mpaghara Ahoada West Local Government Area nke dị na Rivers State, Nigeria. Akinima bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ Ahoda West

Akinima dị n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Rivers State, nke dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Rivers West Senatorial district na Port Harcourt city. Akinima bụ otu n'ime mpaghara nke ebe ide mmiri na-emetụta kwa afọ na Rivers State.
